content.raw:
Not sure if this is in the scope of this PR, but the default locations for _imu_ and _gps_ are out of bounds. Might be nice to move them to a valid position.

```
[ERROR] [1560807825.480374]: wamv_imu imu_wamv is out of bounds
[ERROR] [1560807825.481932]: wamv_imu imu_wamv is at xyz=(0.0, 0.0, 1.3), must fit in at least one of the following boxes:
[ERROR] [1560807825.483328]:   <Box x:[1.3, 0.3] y:[0.5,-0.5] z:[2.3,1.3]>
[ERROR] [1560807825.484722]:   <Box x:[-0.65, -1.15] y:[0.5,-0.5] z:[2.3,1.3]>
[ERROR] [1560807825.485898]: wamv_gps gps_wamv is out of bounds
[ERROR] [1560807825.486914]: wamv_gps gps_wamv is at xyz=(0.0, 0.0, 1.28), must fit in at least one of the following boxes:
[ERROR] [1560807825.487964]:   <Box x:[1.3, 0.3] y:[0.5,-0.5] z:[2.3,1.3]>
[ERROR] [1560807825.488990]:   <Box x:[-0.65, -1.15] y:[0.5,-0.5] z:[2.3,1.3]>
```
content.html:
Not sure if this is in the scope of this PR, but the default locations for imu and gps are out of bounds. Might be nice to move them to a valid position.
